arts.ttl: All 12 Championship weekend games predictions - Week 13
arts.sum:
Frank Lampard's Coventry kick off the weekend schedule knowing victory at Wrexham on Friday sends them six points clear at the top of the Championship — for 24 hours at least.

That is one of 12 matches in a full weekend Championship programme and here are our thoughts on all of them.

arts.ttl: Chair starts: QPR team news and predicted XI to face Ipswich Town
arts.sum: The latest QPR team news and predicted XI as Julien Stephan's side gear up to face Ipswich Town in the Championship. The post Chair starts: QPR team news and predicted XI to face Ipswich Town appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: QPR vs Ipswich predictions: Tractor Boys to win again
arts.sum: Consistency has been an issue for both QPR and Ipswich this season but Elliott Bretland is siding with the Tractor Boys to leave Loftus Road with three points.

arts.ttl: Ipswich Town injury update regarding Chuba Akpom ahead of QPR trip
arts.sum: Ipswich Town signed the attacker in the summer transfer window and it has since taken him time to find his shooting boots again in the Championship. The post Ipswich Town injury update regarding Chuba Akpom ahead of QPR trip appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: “Really good player”: Ipswich Town man hailed by Kieran McKenna ahead of QPR clash
arts.sum: Ipswich Town signed the player back in 2023 and he has since been a useful player to have in their squad. The post “Really good player”: Ipswich Town man hailed by Kieran McKenna ahead of QPR clash appeared first on The72 - Football League News.
